    • queryForInstances

      Collection<ServiceInstance<T>> queryForInstances(String name) throws Exception
      Return all known instances for the given service
      Parameters:
      name - name of the service
      Returns:
      list of instances (or an empty list)
      Throws:
      Exception - errors

    • queryForInstance

      ServiceInstance<T> queryForInstance(String name, String id) throws Exception
      Return a service instance POJO
      Parameters:
      name - name of the service
      id - ID of the instance
      Returns:
      the instance or null if not found
      Throws:
      Exception - errors

    • serviceProviderBuilder

      ServiceProviderBuilder<T> serviceProviderBuilder()
      Allocate a new builder. ServiceProviderBuilder.providerStrategy(org.apache.curator.x.discovery.ProviderStrategy<T>) is set to RoundRobinStrategy
      Returns:
      the builder
